entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
